title: Leon Black Leaving Apollo Global Earlier Than Expected
itunes:title: Leon Black Leaving Apollo Global Earlier Than Expected
description:
Dr. Iman Abuzeid, Co-Founder and CEO at Incredible Health, discusses the pandemic’s impact on the day-to-day lives of American nurses. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Political Reporter Ryan Teague Beckwith talk about the story “The New Rule of Politics Is Never Bothering to Say You’re Sorry.” Bloomberg News Wall Street Reporter Sonali Basak shares her insight on Leon Black leaving his position as CEO at Apollo Global earlier than expected. And we Drive to the Close with Michael Sheldon, Chief Investment Officer at Hightower RDM Financial Group.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
